snippet.title: Bunny Space Odyssey: FlopHop — mini teaser (2d pixel art indie game by Aink Oink Studio)
snippet.description:
Allow me to present my work in progress, a 2D pixel art game titled "Bunny Space Odyssey: FlopHop". The goal of this project is to take players on a contemplative journey that explores existential themes, capturing the essence of hope, disappointment and triumph. Brace yourself for an immersive experience that transcends the boundaries of pixels, inviting you to delve into the profound intricacies of the human experience.

Music: Aink - Norðurljós
Spotify: https://open.spotify.com/track/7KfHHmtb1Xm1eEOe7Gek0i
Apple Music: https://music.apple.com/ge/album/nor%C3%B0urlj%C3%B3s/1684670085?i=1684670359
YaMusic: https://music.yandex.ru/album/17701672/track/89920060

Voice: Mads Bolding
https://www.instagram.com/madsboldingmusic/

Everything that once existed has become star dust. All that was left behind were ashes and forgotten legacies and dreams. Now remains only emptiness and a faint echo of starry melodies. However, even when darkness envelops everything, there is room for hope.

#gamedev #indiegame #ainkoink #ainkoinkstudio #bunnyspaceodyssey #flophop
